title: Action Research-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing Pre-Service Teachers' Intercultural Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Intercultural competency development program referencing Thai teacher training programs, emphasizing pre-service teachers' ability to understand learners in diverse cultural contexts

learning_goals: Students can explain cultural sensitivity with at least three specific examples based on a 4-week action research activity.
Preservice teachers can recognize their cultural biases and develop improvement plans using peer feedback and reflective journaling.
Learners can perform virtual exchange simulations with peers from different cultural backgrounds using smartphone-based collaboration tools and create presentation materials based on the results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
